Articles.Content:
Hi, i want to build a new space station, but when i want to dock two parts of the space station (the lab and the center), i can't dock them. There is any problem ? ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

![9B1kV7M.png](http://i.imgur.com/9B1kV7M.png)

![YoijsH8.png](http://i.imgur.com/YoijsH8.png)

![i9uM0ZK.png](http://i.imgur.com/i9uM0ZK.png)

(Excuse me about my english ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif))
ISS.LAB seems to have the Sr docking port placed on the opposite orientation.

Before docking, check both docking rings. If there is a "Undock" option, this mean you placed this docking ring backward.

4 options

- Forget about docking

- Deorbit the wrong section and send a new one

- Edit your save file.

- Send a dirty part : a claw and a correctly oplaced docking ring. Will look ugly

> 
> ISS.LAB seems to have the Sr docking port placed on the opposite orientation.

No "seems to" about it. That is no doubt on backwards.
